scheduled_maintenances.name: [RBX1/RBX2][Dedicated Servers] - Servers migration from RBX1 to RBX2

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Bare metal offer. This may temporarily affect Availability. Start time : 28/04/2024 22:00 UTC End time : 02/05/2024 05:00 UTC Service impact : Servers being moved from RBX1 to RBX2 might be unavailable for up to 7 hours during the night (22:00 UTC => 05:00 UTC). Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will have to move servers from RBX1 to RBX2 due to the EoL (End of life) of RBX1. Thank you for your understanding.

scheduled_maintenances.name: [Global][Dedicated Servers] - Revision of Linux Distribution Reinstallation

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on Bare Metal servers. This may affect functionality. Start time : 13/05/2024 09:00 UTC End time : 13/05/2024 09:30 UTC Service impact : permanent unavailability of the current distribution upon reinstallation of your dedicated servers. Service improvement : As part of improving and simplifying the use of our products, we are updating the list of Linux distributions available when installing your dedicated servers. For more details, please refer to this link
